text: manusyaril satyavisvasikaleat erravum kututal satrutayullavar yahudarum bahudaivaradhakarumanenn niscayamayum ninakk kanam; nannal kristyanikalan ennu parannavaran visvasikaleat kututal snehamullavarennum. avaril panditanmarum leakaparityagikalaya pureahitanmarumuntennatum avar ahanta natikkunnillennatumanitinu karanam
